entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializerOptions is not accepted for JsonSerializer.Deserialize #77474
  • IDE0025 code fixer changes semantics and sometimes suggests invalid code. #77473
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.13.0 causes build error Error CS0234 : The type or namespace name .. does not exist in the namespace .. (are you missing an assembly reference?) #77472

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35907.16 #77469

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77467
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
